Message.Msg: GOP Is a loser party and it does not understand why it lost yet. If you are not for the people then you are a loser.

GOP may be the losing party, but your Democratic Party is borrowing from our children's future to pay for what you are not able to afford. I will be in Gold in a few weeks. My new senator Warren will vote yes on each new stimulus package and each increase in the long term debt . Her lips will be attached to the President's behind. I voted for Obama in 2008 because he was going to supposedly cut spending. I no longer desire to be a member of a party consisting of many people voting to get to continue to receive a government paycheck of some sort. Not interested in amnesty for illegals either. My healthcare was up 13% last year and 16% this upcoming year paying for their free healthcare.

Message.Title: Protect your 401k's if you have not done it yet, Market is going a lot lower fast
Message.Msg: Protect your 401k's if you have not done it yet, Market is going a lot lower fast

Topic.Title: Protect your 401k's if you have not done it yet, Market is going a lot lower fast

Message.Msg: The only way to protect your 401k is to invest it wisely in proven companies like IBM. Do not time the market and look at 3 to 5 years. Learn from Buffett.

Message.Title: California raised taxes and happy about it
Message.Msg: GOP never learned and Florida is a good example. GOP government is out of touch, the worst in nation. The governor says we don't have money to fix voting!!!!!????? So raise some taxes to fix it like the rest of America.

I think the odds are that we go over the cliff. The Republican House won't vote for any tax increase -- they won't buy into it because they told people they would not raise taxes to get elected. It may cause a recession and they don't want to be part of it. Obama will blame them for any recession because of the increase of taxes on those below $250k. The next year will be rough. European and Asian demand is headed down. The US stock market may take a big hit when all the engineers doing defense work out in California get pink slips -- like Boeing is doing right now. But they are not Obama's problem -- after 99 weeks of unemployment they probably won't qualify for food stamps.
I wrote this on 10/18 and sticking to it.
